name: DSR Mobile
description: Dynamic Social Registry Mobile Application for the Philippines

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes for household verification and document capture.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location services to verify household addresses and provide location-based services.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID for secure biometric authentication to protect your personal information.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app may access contacts to help you find and register household members.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access your photo library to upload documents and profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may use the microphone for voice notes and accessibility features.

personalInfo.purpose: Government social protection services registration and verification
personalInfo.retention: As required by Philippine government data retention policies

biometricData.purpose: Local device authentication only - never transmitted or stored on servers

locationData.purpose: Address verification and location-based service delivery
locationData.retention: As required for service delivery and government records

appStore.shortDescription: Official mobile app for the Philippines Dynamic Social Registry system
appStore.fullDescription: The DSR Mobile app is the official mobile application for the Philippines Dynamic Social Registry (DSR) system. It provides citizens and government workers with secure, offline-capable access to social protection services including household registration, benefit applications, case management, and service delivery tracking.
